title: CoHabit Mobile Application Design
summary: Roommate matching app that helps students find compatible roommates and manage shared living tasks.

title: StarFish Redesign
summary: A complete UI redesign focused on improving accessibility and user flow for StarFish, a student resource platform.

title: DishDive Website
summary: Recipe-sharing website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that lets users browse, comment, and rate dishes. Designed with a clean layout and interactive features.

title: LawBandit Home UI Redesign
summary: Case study that explored pain points in a legal education platform. Created wireframes and prototypes to streamline user flow and improve learning engagement.

title: Badger Mart
summary: AI-powered campus marketplace concept that allows students to list, buy, and sell items with smart search and mobile-first design principles.

title: LPHIE Madison Chapter Website Redesign
summary: Website built for Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity. Implemented responsive layouts and interactive content to enhance recruitment and alumni engagement.
